entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the one who muttered to herself about having poor short term memory. She is described as loudly enough for everyone to hear her.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy looked as though Christmas had come a month early.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione had turned scarlet with suppressed rage.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the one who was telling everyone about the herd of thestrals. He threw an uneasy glance at Umbridge's clipboard.

entities.name: tenebrus
entities.description: Tenebrus is a horse that Hagrid patted and called his special favorite.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic has classified thestrals as 'dangerous'.

entities.name: thestrals
entities.description: Thestrals are animals that Hagrid was telling everyone about.

relationships.description: The Ministry of Magic has classified thestrals as 'dangerous', which Umbridge mentioned.
Hagrid patted Tenebrus and called him his special favorite.
